channel.title: How do i spawn an item?
channel.description: how do i spawn an item>?

item.title: How do i spawn an item?
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

Search your client.java for pickup should have something looking like else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerRights >= 2))

Change (admin) to your name

Save, Compile, Run.

Then do ::pickup 0995 2000000

Yay! 2 million gold coins!

Change 0995 to the item number of what you want. If you need an item list look around in your moparscape folder under “all_ids”.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i spawn an item?

item.title: How do i spawn an item?
item.dc:creator: @Titch_da_midget Titch_da_midget
item.description:
@Titch_da_midget wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:2, topic:109938”]::pickup (itemID) (itemamount)
::pickup 0995 100000
100k cash
amount can only be greater than 1 if it’s a noted ID
if pickup don’t work
::item (itemID) (itemamount)[/quote]know where i can gte list of codes?

Read full topic
